naslov: Prodaja, Kuća, Samostojeća, Zadarska županija, Zadar, Brodarica (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se vila u prvom redu do mora na top lokaciji u Zadru i odličnim pogledom na more te centar grada. Sastoji se od 7 stambenih jedinica, raspoređenih na prizemelju te prvom i drugom katu. Bruto površina objekta iznosi 683m2 te je izgrađena na zemljištu površine 780m2. Sve stabmene jedinice su namješte, klimatizirane te opremljen centralnim grijanjem s kotlovnicom smještenom u prizemlju. Objekt je u turističkom najmu, ostvaruje izvanredne prihode te novi vlasnik po želji može preuzeti uhodano poslovanje. Aparmtani su kategorizirani s tri i četiri zvijezdice. Iza objekta se nalazi roštilj te pomoćni objekt koji služi kao ostava. Parking se nalazi u sklopu okućnice te može primiti 7-8 vozila. U sklopu okućnice nalazimo i vrt na mjesto kojeg se može izgraditi i bazen. Veći broj restorana, plaža i marina je u krugu od 500m. Do centra Zadra stiže se pješke obalom za 15min. Detaljini tlocrti, površine i sva ostala dokumentacija je dostupna na upit. Vlasništvo je uredno. Više informacija i razgledavanje: Telefon: +385 99 701 6618 Email: marin.roncevic@c21.hr ---------------------------------------- ENGLISH: A villa for sale in the first row to the sea in a prime location in Zadar with an excellent sea view and the city center. It consists of 7 residential units, distributed on the ground floor and the first and second floors. The gross area of ​​the building is 683m2 and it was built on a plot of land of 780m2. All apartment units are furnished, air-conditioned and equipped with central heating with a boiler room located on the ground floor. The building is rented for tourists, generates extraordinary income, and the new owner can take over the well-established business if he wishes. Apartments are categorized with three and four stars. Behind the building there is a barbecue and an auxiliary building that serves as a storage room. The parking lot is located within the garden and can accommodate 7-8 vehicles. There is also a garden where a swimming pool can be built. A large number of restaurants, beaches and marinas are within 500m. The center of Zadar can be reached on foot along the coast in 15 minutes. Detailed floor plans, surfaces and all other documentation are available on request. Clear Title and documentation! More information and sightseeing: Phone: +385 99 701 6618 Email: marin.roncevic@c21.hr
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Josipa Bana Jelačića 1d, 23000 Zadar, Zadarska, Hrvatska
